item.title: Might Need to Gain Some Weight!
item.description: It’s time for a change!

media:content.media:title: Might Need to Gain Some Weight!

item.title: Dealing With a Bent Tire Rim - Off to Repair
item.description: A simple mishap caused a big problem. This video captures the full process of handling a bent rim, detailing the cost of repair and the challenging steps required to get the wheel fixed correctly.

item.title: Putting Everything to Good Use!
item.description: What happens when we finally take old equipment and scrap material and turn it into something valuable? This video documents the satisfying process of putting every resource to good use on the farm.

item.title: Buying All My Neighbor's Farming Equipment!
item.description: What happens when you buy an entire inventory? This video is a full look at the massive sale, detailing every piece of equipment we acquired and how this huge purchase will change the future of our operation.

item.title: These Tractors Are Still Working!
item.description: What makes old tractors so resilient? This video celebrates the incredible durability of vintage farm equipment, showing these classic machines still running strong and getting the job done today.

item.title: Why Do We Spend So Much Money On Water
item.description: This video explores the hidden reasons behind the high cost of water. We'll show you where your money goes, from pipes and pumping to purification processes, and the surprising truth about the expense.

item.title: Here's Why We Bought This Land!
item.description: Ever wonder why we chose this specific piece of property? This video documents the full story, breaking down the financial, strategic, and personal reasons we bought this land for the farm's future.

item.title: Time To Give Our Thirsty Crops A Drink
item.description: The crops are thirsty! This video documents the essential process of irrigation, showing the equipment and techniques we use to deliver water and ensure a healthy, successful harvest.

item.title: This Mistake has Cost us so Much Money!
item.description: Go inside an honest account of a major error. This video documents a costly mistake we made on the job, showing the full financial impact and the important, often painful, lesson we learned.

item.title: Can we Beat The Thunderstorm?
item.description: The thunder is rolling in, and time is running out. Join us in the field as we push our equipment and ourselves to the limit to beat the thunderstorm and avoid a major disaster.

item.title: We're Going to be Paying for This for the Next 30 Years!
item.description: Go inside a major financial decision. We share the honest story behind a huge loan and the daunting reality of knowing we'll be paying for this for the next 30 years.

item.title: Keeping a Straight Line is HARD!
item.description: Why is keeping a straight line so much harder than it looks? This video documents the challenge of precision driving and the techniques and focus required to get the job done right in the field.

item.title: Gas VS Electric | Homestead Clean Up
item.description: Which equipment is better for homestead cleanup? This video puts Gas vs. Electric tools to the ultimate test, comparing power, efficiency, and cost for a massive yard organization project.

item.title: This Tractor is full of Spider Webs!
item.description: What happens when a tractor sits untouched for years? This video documents the surprising moment we uncovered a machine completely full of spider webs and the long process of cleaning it out.

item.title: A Girl and Her Big Rig!
item.description: Go inside the cab for a day in the life! This video documents the journey of a young female driver, showing the hard work, challenges, and pride of operating a massive big rig.

item.title: Changing Our Tractors Tires!
item.description: This video documents a major transition on the farm, showing the last run of our red combine and the highly anticipated, first run of the new green machine. Go inside the exciting moment that marks a new era for our operation.

item.title: Red Combine In the Beginning, Green Combine At the End
item.description: Red Combine In the Beginning, Green Combine At the End

item.title: Behind The Scenes Of Bean Dust
item.description: What creates that massive cloud during the bean harvest? This behind-the-scenes video explains the reality of bean dust, showing the cleanup challenges and the steps we take to manage the mess.

item.title: A Green Combine?
item.description: A surprising new addition to the fleet!

item.title: Too Much Wind Today!
item.description: What happens when the wind is too strong to work? This video documents the frustrating challenge of a high-wind day, showing the unexpected problems it causes for equipment and operations.
